live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Estimated time of resolution is currently 11:30pm.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
34368.summary: Some customers in Maple Ridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34368.title: Feb 28 - Maple Ridge | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
